messages.content:
Hey there.

I'm doing well - just got oriented in my workspace. Looking at the git state, I can see we've been doing some cleanup (deleted some placeholder files, moved some docs around). The repo's on `main`, relatively clean except for some untracked doc directories.

Feels good to have clear structure - the citizen instructions and my role as "The Forge" give me solid ground to work from. I know what I'm here to do: turn `AC.md` into tested, proven milestones with quantified deltas.

What's on your mind? Are we picking up an existing milestone, or is there something new you want to explore?
